subject: [Radiance-general] 2015 International Radiance WorkshopRegistration - PROGRAM
body:
Message-ID: <4CBA3F4FC743644B878E92A40FD348F9D768BCA2@ENGR2K10NODE1.engr.psu.edu>

The program for the 2015 International Radiance Workshop to be held August 17-19 in Philadelphia, PA is now available at www.engr.psu.edu/ae/faculty/mistrick/2015_RADIANCE_WORKSHOP_PROGRAM.pdf<http://www.engr.psu.edu/ae/faculty/mistrick/2015_RADIANCE_WORKSHOP_PROGRAM.pdf>.

You can register for the event at http://www.cvent.com/events/14th-annual-international-radiance-workshop/event-summary-9869b51ebebe45ad8cb25fdf2e31fd89.aspx.

I look forward to seeing you there.

Richard Mistrick
Penn State University
